casebody.data:
JOHN N. WHITING, Appellant, v. BENJAMIN M. PRICE, Respondent.

Before Curtis, Ch. J., and Speir, J.

Decided April 5, 1880. Appeal from judgment. Swall Sergeant, attorney, and A. J. Vanderpoel, and Almon Goodwin, of counsel, for appellant. George J. Peet, for respondent. Per Curiam.

Judgment appealed from affirmed, with costs to respondent.
